EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi ChiangFeng, Thank you for completing the Turbonomic IT Maturity Survey! You should receive your Amazon Gift Card shortly. I can offer you another $100 Amazon Gift Card or a $100 donation to a charity of your choice if I can schedule 30 minutes between you and a Turbonomic Engineer. You indicated on your survey several challenges that Turbonomic directly addresses, specifically: - Overprovisioned Infrastructure and Inefficiency - Turbonomic has been proven to reduce infrastructure requirements by 30% or more through intelligent consolidation - Troubleshooting/Proactive Monitoring - Turbonomic has been proven to decrease performance alerts by 80% or more through its patented automation engine - Service Degradation/Downtime - Turbonomic has been proven to increase application performance by 37% while eliminating 80% of tickets - Growth in Environment Complexity - Turbonomic’s vendor-agnostic, patented analytics have been proven to reduce infrastructure requirements by 30% or more through intelligent
Do you have some time to speak over the next couple of weeks? To receive your gift card or donation, you must schedule your consultation within the next 7 days and complete it within the next 14 days. Thank you, Going to Cisco Live? Meet with a Turbonomic Executive <[[https://turbonomic.com/leadership-meetings]]> James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>
